content: व्यतिकर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Reciprocal. {@--2@} Spreading, pervading. {@--3@} Contiguous, near. --रः {@--1@} Mixture, intermixture, mixing, blending together; तीर्थे तोयव्यतिकरभवे जह्नुकन्यासरय्वोः <ls>R. 8. 95</ls>; व्यतिकर इव भीमस्तामसो वैद्युतश्च <ls>U. 5. 13</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 52.</ls> {@--2@} Contact, union, combination; रुद्रेणेदमुमाकृतव्यतिकरे स्वांगे विभक्तं द्विधा <ls>M. 1. 4</ls>; <ls>Māl. 7</ls>, <ls>Śi. 4. 53</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">7. 28.</ls> {@--3@} Striking against; <ls>Māl. 5. 34.</ls> {@--4@} Obstruction; <ls>Ku. 5. 85.</ls> {@--5@} An incident, occurrence, affair, a thing, matter; एवंविधे व्यतिकरे ‘such being the case.’ {@--6@} An opportunity. {@--7@} Misfortune, calamity. {@--8@} Mutual relation, reciprocity. {@--9@} Exchange, interchange. {@--10@} Alternation.
